#include <iostream>
 
using namespace std;
 
int pcheck(int b) {
    if (b % 2 == 0)
        return 0;
    else {
        for (int i = 3; i < b; i += 2) {
            if (b % i == 0)
                return 0;
        }
    }
    return 1;
}
 
int rev(int b) {
    int j = 0;
    while (b > 0) {
        j = j * 10 + b % 10;
        b /= 10;
    }
    return j;
}
 
int main() {
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    if (n > 98689) {
        printf("1003001\n");
    }
    else {
        while (n <= 98689) {
            if (n == rev(n) && pcheck(n)) {
                printf("%d\n", n);
                break;
            }
            else {
                n++;
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
